api_list.api_description: Get one or multiple pairs by chain and pair addresses.

required_parameters.name: chain_id
required_parameters.description: The blockchain chain id such as ethereum, bsc, polygon, etc.

required_parameters.name: pair_addresses
required_parameters.description: One or multiple, comma-separated pair addresses (up to 30 addresses).

api_list.api_description: Retrieves extra detail on supported symbols.

query: I want to find details about a trading pair, say UNI/ETH, on the Binance Smart Chain and also get its symbol details from Gemini.
